namespace-authority.organisation-address: 1895 Preston White Drive, Suite 100, Reston, Virginia 20191

identifier-syntax.description: The syntax of the handle string is: PREFIX"/"SUFFIX where PREFIX is a globally unique string identifying the administrative unit of the handle; and SUFFIX is any unique "local name" chosen by the prefix holder. Handles may consist of any printable characters from the UCS-2 character set. There is no limit on the length of a handle string, nor on any of its components. A handle SUFFIX may contain any characters defined in UCS-2. A handle PREFIX may contain any characters defined in UCS-2, except the character '/'.

identifier-normalization.description: By default, handles are case sensitive; however, any handle service may define its namespace under which all ASCII characters within any identifier are case insensitive.
